text: I am a professional programmer, looking to help others out with my skills. Other than development I'm also a salsa dancer and a Magician!

subjects.name: Become famous
subjects.quote: Oh how wrong we were to think immortality meant never dying.

subjects.name: Gain superpowers
subjects.quote: With great power comes great responsibility

subjects.name: Rule the world
subjects.quote: Do not mock a love-smitten mouse.
